title: LegacyOfKain  Blood Omen 1 PC-CompactedPortable
description:
Hi to all PC games fans and in particularly to the Legacy of Kain addicts ...


This file have the Legacy of Kain Blood Omen 1 game in a single executable
that can be used by compacted portability method, or be extracted out completly ...

more information below ...


Uploader Quick Notes :

Hi nice PC games fans and it beeing a pleasure beeing work with the Legacy of Kain series working them to get Compacted Portables Executables with only the saves outside the game exectable, this particular file make sense the next quick notes for a guy that are working the series collection and this notes are :

 this game was the first one from this Legacy of kain series and was maded in 1996 and have another curiosity detail that it is that was necessar about 2 and half years for the developers Silicons Knights have this first game from this series ready to be out and this game have 2D graphics but great addictive playability for a nice balanced role playing game and it is games like this that makes us , pc players remember a bit the story of the graphics improvements on the games and computer capacity to showing them too on the games ... 
ok thatÃ‚Â´s all from this notes and have fun ...



This is the instructions to run the game :


run CompactedPortableStarter and in 10 seconds
the game will start 

after playing and quitting game the saves will be at the SAVED
folder on the compacted exectable directory and the executable
is deleted 



GETTING THE COMPACTED PORTABLE EXECUTABLE OUT OPTION

to get the portable executable to quick launch just run
the executable with the same name and wait 10 to 15 seconds and
a compacted portable executable with 223 Mb will be available on the folder and
after that move the extracted executable to somewhere else on the computer
to let the compressed compacted portable do is work if you want but wherever
you move the compactedportable executable copy also to the same directory the 
SAVED folder to make the saves playing the game if you are running the
extracted executable 


Happy game ...


LOK BloodOmen1 PC-CompactedPortable GlobeplusRippingWork GamingIsForEveryone
